column4: so anyone got a recent version kvirc running on Ubuntu, the one in the repo is badly outdted
how did you install, i cant since i have outdated libs
i can't remember if i added the repository to my sources, or just dpkg -i'ed the files, but it all worked fine
i gat a bunch of version mismatches
wich version of kvirc do you use ?
whe i build from source i get a dlopen error in ./configure
as far as i can see in my config.log, i got a dlopen error, but it was non-fatal
so what sould i do then nikkia ?
it gave a dlopen error, then tried again using -ldl and decided that worked
I get a bunch of lines saying dlopen is not available and the i get "configure: error: "This was fatal...aborting"
